Articles.Content: Ive seen where some vehicles such as the Delta II have 9 solid boosters, but only light 6 on the ground and then 3 more in the air at certian altitude. Can someone explain what purpose this serves?

Ive seen where some vehicles such as the Delta II have 9 solid boosters, but only light 6 on the ground and then 3 more in the air at certian altitude. Can someone explain what purpose this serves?

it's because they only need all 9 at a certain time, there's no need to turn them all on at launch, it wastes fuel.
Maybe it has somthing to do with terminal velocity.
I thought it was to keep up the TWR when they detached the first set of boosters
